Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, love of; transitoriness, of earthly love
_description: Advice that only Christ’s love remains — two couplets in a Latin sermon by Friar Nicolas Philip

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
Werdys lowe lestyth but a qwyȝle In werdly loue is al wey
                    gyȝle leue may commen & lofe may goon But trost lofe is
                    þer noon but oon
BodLatTheD1.Editions:
Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “Selected Verses from Bodleian Library MS Lat. Th. D.1.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         90 (1989): 163-6: 164.
